Print

Obsolete

This element will become obsolete from version 22.0. AccScheduleName is no longer printable directly as they are only row definitions, print instead related Financial Report by calling directly the Account Schedule Report with SetFinancialReportName or SetFinancialReportNameNonEditable.

[Obsolete(AccScheduleName is no longer printable directly as they are only row definitions, print instead related Financial Report by calling directly the Account Schedule Report with SetFinancialReportName or SetFinancialReportNameNonEditable.,22.0)]
procedure Print()
